entry.title: 7/15 - Unsolicited Submissions
entry.content:

====== DESCRIPTION ======

Aware of many galleriesâ€™ policy to not accept â€œunsolicited submissions,â€ the curators of Ejecta Projects seek artists who may be deterred by this exclusivity.

Artistsâ€™ submissions that arrive by July 15, 2019 and adhere to our guidelines will be considered by the directors of Ejecta Projects for a thematic exhibition titled Unsolicited Submissions.

While it is unlikely we will be able to mount work from every artist, ALL submission materials that follow our guidelines will be color printed, folder bound, and prominently displayed in the exhibition as a library of work that was considered for the show. This library will be perusable by gallery visitors and regional curators during our normal operating hours.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Please follow guidelines for entry: https://ejectaprojects.com
Contact us with questions at ejectaprojects@gmail.com
